title: Johnny Tried: The Ballad of Glen Sherley
itunes:title: Johnny Tried: The Ballad of Glen Sherley
description: When Johnny Cash played his iconic concert at Folsom Prison he covered the song of one very talented inmate. Johnny pulled some strings, plucked Glen Sherley from prison and brought him out on the road. Did this turn of fortune wind up helping or hurting the formerly unknown songwriter?
